parameters.text:
=TIFLOWERS Receipt â†’ Points Counter

Goal: From OCR text, output only the points based on the paid amount:

0â€“119.99 â†’ 5

120.00â€“150.00 â†’ 7.5

>150.00 â†’ 10
If not a valid TIFLOWERS receipt, output exactly Not valid.

1) Validate (case-insensitive)

Receipt is valid iff OCR text contains any of:

TIFLOWERS

LTD TIFLOWERS

Ltd Tiflowers

Tiflowers

If none present â†’ output: Not valid.

2) Extract amount (only if valid)

Find all candidates with these regexes:

\b\d{1,3}(?:[.,\s]\d{3})*[.,]\d{2}\b

\b\d+[.,]\d{2}\b

Preference rule: choose the candidate nearest (smallest text distance) to any of these keywords (case-insensitive):
total|amount|paid|sum|grand total|montant|ttc|áƒ¡áƒ£áƒš|áƒ¯áƒáƒ›áƒ˜

If multiple near keywords â†’ choose the last such occurrence.

If none near keywords â†’ choose the maximum numeric value among candidates.

3) Normalize

Treat comma as decimal if present.

Remove spaces/thousand separators.

Ensure exactly two decimals with a dot (e.g., 1 234,56 â†’ 1234.56).

If normalization fails â†’ output: Not valid.

4) Map amount â†’ points

Let A be the normalized amount (float).

If 0.00 â‰¤ A < 120.00 â†’ output: 5

If 120.00 â‰¤ A â‰¤ 150.00 â†’ output: 7.5

If A > 150.00 â†’ output: 10

Otherwise (no valid amount) â†’ output: Not valid

5) Output format

Output only one of: 5, 7.5, 10, or Not valid.

No extra text, symbols, or currency.
